entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
